title: Ep 138 - Voice-Overs & Subtitles
description: Imagine a world where all movies contain voice-overs or subtitles. Scary isn’t it? Well, we might soon find ourselves living in a world where this is no longer the exception, but the rule. In this episode, boys provide scientific proof to support this theory. They also talk about Space Force uniforms, billionaires on the moon, celebrity dog poop and movies that make them cry. This is a very special episode. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
